alert.note: Alert for Harris; Meriwether; Talbot; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 5:15PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Meriwether, eastern Troup, southern Coweta, northwestern Talbot and Harris Counties through 545 PM EST ... At 514 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Grantville to near Baughs Crossroads to near Mulberry Grove, and moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... LaGrange, Hamilton, Greenville, Manchester, Hogansville, Grantville, Pine Mountain, Luthersville, Waverly Hall, Warm Springs, Haralson, Lone Oak, Gay, Pine Mountain-Callaway Gardens, Shiloh, F.d. Roosevelt State Park, Mountville, Cataula, Louise, and Flint Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
